full_text:
INTERNSHIP COMPLETION CERTIFICATE   
   
This is to certify that Shikhar Gupta, a student of IIIT Sonepat, has completed his/her internship with Mocapay 
Infotech India Pvt. Ltd. from Jun 2, 2025, to Aug 2, 2025.   
   
During the internship period, he was designated as an AI/ML Intern and was involved in the Project - AI Interview 
BOT   
   
He demonstrated a keen interest in learning, exhibited good communication and teamwork skills, and completed the 
assigned work responsibly.   
   
We wish Shikhar all the best in his future endeavors.   
   
Date: Aug 4, 2025   
Place: Delhi NCR   
   
Abhiruchi Joshi   
   
Sr. HR Manager
